mapper.select: SELECT /* com.itsme.letitgo.admin.payment.model.mapper.AdminPaymentMapper#selectAdminPaymentHistory() */ A.PAY_NO , C.CO_COM_NAME , A.PAY_DATE , D.PRODUCT_NAME , A.PAY_PRICE FROM TBL_PAYMENT_HISTORY A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.CO_MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO) JOIN TBL_CO_MEMBER_ADD_INFO C ON (B.MEM_NO = C.CO_MEM_NO) JOIN TBL_PRODUCT_LIST D ON (A.PRODUCT_NO = D.PRODUCT_NO)

SELECT /* com.itsme.letitgo.admin.payment.model.mapper.AdminPaymentMapper#selectAdminRefundHistory() */ A.PAY_CHANGE_NO , B.PAY_NO , B.PAY_DATE , A.PAY_REQ_DATE , A.PAY_ANS_DATE , B.PAY_PRICE , A.PAY_CHANGE_STATUS , A.PAY_CHANGE_REASON , A.PAY_REJECT_REASON FROM TBL_PAYMENT_CHANGE_HISTORY A JOIN TBL_PAYMENT_HISTORY B ON (A.PAY_NO = B.PAY_NO) ORDER BY A.PAY_CHANGE_NO
mapper.update: UPDATE /* com.itsme.letitgo.admin.payment.model.mapper.AdminPaymentMapper#updateRefundStatus() */ TBL_PAYMENT_CHANGE_HISTORY SET PAY_ANS_DATE = SYSDATE , PAY_CHANGE_STATUS = '환불완료' WHERE PAY_CHANGE_NO = #{ payChangeNo }
UPDATE /* com.itsme.letitgo.admin.payment.model.mapper.AdminPaymentMapper#updateRefundStatus2() */ TBL_PAYMENT_HISTORY SET PAY_KINDS = '환불완료' WHERE PAY_NO = #{ payNo }
UPDATE /* com.itsme.letitgo.admin.payment.model.mapper.AdminPaymentMapper#updateRefundRejectStatus2() */ TBL_PAYMENT_HISTORY SET PAY_KINDS = '환불거절' WHERE PAY_NO = #{ payNo }
